title: Get Rebecca Judd's race day look: Footy WAG shows off her style
text:
Rebecca Judd has offered her fans some fashion inspiration in the lead up to Australia's most prestigious horse race, the Melbourne Cup.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, the 36-year-old model and footy WAG showed off some of her favourite race day outfits.

Looking red carpet ready in a variety of classy ensembles, she captioned her gallery of photos: 'Head to toe racing looks.'

Steal her style: Rebecca Judd has offered her fans some fashion inspiration in the lead up to Australia's most prestigious horse race, the Melbourne Cup

The wife of AFL legend Chris Judd looked sensational as she skillfully posed for photos in the kitchen of her $7.3million Melbourne mansion.

In the first photo, Rebecca modelled a striking red sleeveless dress which she paired with matching pumps.

The Postcards host accessorised with an elegant pearl headpiece.

Sitting pretty! Taking to Instagram on Thursday, the 36-year-old model and footy WAG showed off some of her favourite race day outfits

In the second photo, Rebecca wore a blue off-the-shoulder frock with a blush pink hair wrap and matching nude heels.

For her third and final look, she rocked a daring low-cut sequined wrap dress.

Rebecca opted for a versatile makeup palette that worked cohesively with each look, adding drama with a smouldering smokey eye.

She woke up like this! Rebecca opted for a versatile makeup palette that worked cohesively with each look, adding drama with a smouldering smokey eye

Wow! For her third and final look, the mother-of-four rocked a low-cut sequined wrap dress

It comes after the mother-of-four shared her day on a plate with Mamamia earlier this year, which surprisingly includes dessert every night.

She has 'muesli and a strong latte for breakfast, followed by sushi or a focaccia for lunch, and 'crackers with cheese or popcorn' as snacks.

Dinner is some form of lean meat with brown rice and a salad, and dessert is either chocolate, ice cream or cake.
description: Rebecca Judd has offered her fans some fashion inspiration in the lead up to Australia's most prestigious horse race, the Melbourne Cup.
authors: Joe Scek For Daily Mail Australia
